title: Billy Bathgate (1991) (Dustin Hoffman, Nicole Kidman)
description:
BILLY BATHGATE - 1991

IMDb Rating: 5.7
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0101453/

  Based on the novel by E.L. Doctorow, Billy Bathgate is the story of a street-smart boy (Loren Dean) who, after a chance encounter with racketeering kingpin Dutch Schultz (Dustin Hoffman), sets out to apprentice himself to the Mafia and ride the roller-coaster life of a gangster. Things get complicated when Billy is put in charge of looking after a rich society dame Drew Preston [Nicole Kidman], who has a sham marriage to a gay but powerful New Yorker. She gets her kicks by dating gangsters. She's in terrible danger because of something she saw, but she doesn't seem to be aware of it, though Billy is. He's also aware that she's the most beautiful and desirable woman he's ever met.

  Starring: Dustin Hoffman, Nicole Kidman, Loren Dean, Bruce Willis, Steve Buscemi, Steven Hill.

  Directed by: Robert Benton.
